title: Write installation README
description: Document how to install the plugin, list all available skills and commands, provide usage examples.
close_reason: Updated README with installation instructions, skills list, commands, and plugin structure

title: Rename repo to claude-marketplace
description:
Rename GitHub repo from The-Focus-AI/thefocus-skills to The-Focus-AI/claude-marketplace.

Steps:
1. Go to GitHub repo settings
2. Rename repository
3. Update local git remote
4. Update beads prefix to match new name
5. Update any internal references

title: Convert commands to plugin format
description: Move existing commands from `commands/` to plugin `commands/` directory with proper naming.
close_reason: Added YAML frontmatter with descriptions to both commands

title: Remove deprecated skills from repo

- skill-creator/
- mcp-builder/
- nano-banana-imagegen/ (already extracted to nano-banana-cli repo)

title: Convert thefocus-skills to Claude Code marketplace plugin
description:
Transform thefocus-skills into a Claude Code marketplace plugin with 5 skills and 2 commands.

**Keep in plugin:**
- theme-factory
- focus-ai-brand
- focus-account-integration
- distill-backend-service
- twitter-oauth-cli
- /do-research command
- /engineering-processes-advisor command

**Remove:**
- document-skills/ (pdf, docx, xlsx, pptx)
- skill-creator/
- mcp-builder/

**Already extracted:**
- nano-banana-imagegen â†’ github.com/The-Focus-AI/nano-banana-cli
acceptance_criteria:
- Plugin installable via `/plugin marketplace add The-Focus-AI/claude-marketplace`
- All 5 skills trigger correctly based on descriptions
- Both commands available via `/` prefix
- README documents installation and usage
- Removed skills deleted from repo

title: Create plugin manifest (.claude-plugin/plugin.json)
description: Create the required plugin.json manifest with name, version, description, author, and component paths.
close_reason: Created .claude-plugin/plugin.json with name, version, description, author, repository

title: Test plugin installation end-to-end
description: Install plugin via dev marketplace, test all skills trigger correctly, verify commands work, test in fresh session.

title: Create marketplace.json for distribution
